report.title: Locations for groups.
report.description: Returns the list of sites that are linked to a recording group.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN groups_locations gl on gl.location_id=l.id and gl.deleted=false AND gl.group_id=#group_id# LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter#

param.name: group_id
param.description: The group to show locations for

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location_type_ids to allow for inclusion in the results.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
